newsitem.title: BRAZIL: RESEARCH ALERT-Eletropaulo still a hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Eletropaulo still a hold.

text.p: ING Barings said Friday it has reaffirmed its holding rating on Brazilian state-owned power distributor Eletropaulo with a June 1998 target price of 365 reais or $315 per 1,000 shares.

-- ING analyst Charles Barnett said in a report that the firm's second-quarter net income of 47 million reais or 1.51 reais per 1,000 shares, was down 37 percent versus the same period last year and 40 percent lower than forecast.

-- Net sales increased 12 percent year-on-year to 1.234 billion reais fueled by higher prices after a rate hike in April, he said. -- Operating income reached 156 million reais, down 11 percent year-on-ytear and 16 percent below expectations due to higher payroll, services and maintenance, he added.
-- Eletropaulo preferred B was down 3.33 percent at 305 reais at 1301 local time/1201 GMT in Sao Paulo while its comon was untraded.
